Files: "data file incubations.xlsx"
Source: Ingo Schoening <ischoen@bgc-jena.mpg.de>
Curator: J. Beem-Miller
Date received: 16-Apr-2018
Contents:
  - soil moisture content, CO2 measurements, and experimental information for laboratory soil incubations of the Biodiversity Exploratories samples conducted for a project led by Ingo Schoening in 2011 and 2012 at the Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry
Notes:
  - file acquired from the Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry shared drive (BGP/projekts/Biodiversity Exploratories)
References:
